properties.title: Almagellerh√ºtte SAC
properties.description: A popular alpine and hiking cabin on the southern side of Weissmies. A starting point for high mountain and climbing tours, base for sport climbing and stopover for multi-day hiking tours. It offers a view through the Almagellertal of the Mischabel range and nine four-thousanders. The pavilion next to the cabin is an additional accomodation for groups. Besides the direct access from the valley, there are two high routes via Kreuzboden or Furggstalden.
